code: import*as axios from"axios";var baseUrl="https://full-stack-shop.herokuapp.com/";var instance=axios.create({headers:{"x-auth-token":sessionStorage.getItem("token"),"content-type":"application/json; charset=utf-8"}});export var testAPI={changeFilter:function changeFilter(data){var pageSize=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;var pageNumber=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:1;return instance.post(baseUrl+"goods?page=".concat(pageNumber,"&pageSize=").concat(pageSize),{data:data});},subscribeNewUser:function subscribeNewUser(email){return instance.post(baseUrl+'auth/subscribe',{email:email});},getMyUsers:function getMyUsers(){return instance.get(baseUrl+"users");},getGood:function getGood(id){return axios.get(baseUrl+"goods/".concat(id));},login:function login(email,password){var rememberMe=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return instance.post(baseUrl+"auth/",{email:email,password:password,rememberMe:rememberMe});},register:function register(name,email,password){return instance.post(baseUrl+"users",{name:name,email:email,password:password});},forgotPassword:function forgotPassword(forgotEmail){return instance.post(baseUrl+"users/forgot_password",{forgotEmail:forgotEmail});},resetPassword:function resetPassword(newPassword,verifyPassword,token){return instance.post(baseUrl+"users/reset_password",{newPassword:newPassword,verifyPassword:verifyPassword,token:token});},changeUserPass:function changeUserPass(oldPass,newPassword,verifyPassword,email){return instance.post(baseUrl+"users/change_password",{oldPass:oldPass,newPassword:newPassword,verifyPassword:verifyPassword,email:email});},getAuth:function getAuth(){return instance.get(baseUrl+"auth/user");},getReviews:function getReviews(){return instance.get(baseUrl+"goods/reviews").then(function(response){return response.data;});},setOrders:function setOrders(items,inform,id){return instance.post(baseUrl+"orders",{items:items,inform:inform,userId:id});},setUnloginOrders:function setUnloginOrders(data){return instance.post(baseUrl+"orders/unlogin",{data:data});},getOrders:function getOrders(id){return axios.get(baseUrl+"orders/".concat(id));},getInform:function getInform(id){return axios.get(baseUrl+"inform/".concat(id));},updateInform:function updateInform(id,inform){var config={header:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}};return instance.put(baseUrl+"inform/".concat(id),inform,config);},setInform:function setInform(id,inform){inform.append("isAddInform",true);var config={header:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}};return instance.post(baseUrl+"inform/".concat(id),inform,config);},sendHelpMessage:function sendHelpMessage(helpMessage,id){return instance.post(baseUrl+"users/help",{helpMessage:helpMessage,userId:id});},setReviews:function setReviews(name,photo,files,goodsId){var rating=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:100;files.append("name",name);files.append("photo",photo);files.append("rating",rating);var config={header:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}};return instance.post(baseUrl+"goods/reviews/".concat(goodsId),files,config);}};
